views.markdown:
- Updated support for an upcoming tweak. - Fixed an issue where rotating while keeping scrolling would cause a crash. - Added support for an upcoming new tweak. - Added iOS 10.x support - Fixed icons appearing in random sizes after some rotations. - Fixed passcode UI at lockscreen - Fixed crash when exiting form Emergency call at lockscreen - Added iOS 9.2-9.3.x support - Fixes several iOS8 to iOS9 specific issues.
- Handles insecure UIKit-linked tweaks that tent to load in non-UIKit linking processes causing all other UIKit-linking tweaks to load themselves inside non-UIKit-linking processes.

- Added iOS 9 support.
- Fixed minor issues
- Fixes an issue where a license popup keeps appearing

- Added support up to iOS 8.3
